medical_history.chief_complaint: Right upper quadrant pain and midepigastric pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain started 2 hours after dinner, is non-radiating and constant. The patient reports nausea without vomiting, denies fevers, but experiences sweats. Diarrhea has occurred for the past 6 days. Previous visit to the ED for similar symptoms resulted in a diagnosis of biliary colic.
